summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4896 for the improvement of Willow Street, from the alley west of Seward Park Avenue to Rainier Avenue; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56111, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
